verses.name: 2 Chronicles 19:1
verses.text: And Jehoshaphat the king of Judah returned to his house in peace to Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 19:2
verses.text: And Jehu the son of Hanani the seer went out to meet him, and said to king Jehoshaphat, Shouldest thou help the ungodly, and love them that hate the Lord? therefore is wrath upon thee from before the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 19:3
verses.text: Nevertheless there are good things found in thee, in that thou hast taken away the groves out of the land, and hast prepared thine heart to seek God.
